cab.content: From Viceroy, Foreign Department, oOth July 19.17. (Repeated to Arab Bureau, Cairo, Tehran and Meshed.) (Received at India Office 31st Julv, 10.30 a.m.) Foreign Secret. Afghanistan. Monthly ,report. Internal situationnormal and quiet. Amir said to have expressed concern at Russian situationas affecting Allies' cause with which he implicitly identifies himself.Nasrulla reported to have told Wazir deputation that Afghanistan would notcountenance any anti-British disturbances and that the more we chastisedMahsuds the better.
